memberdef.name: long_comment
memberdef.initializer: = "This is really quite a long comment. It is designed to be long enough " "to screw up the encoders and decoders if the file container format does " "not handle things correctly. If everything is working correctly, the " "decoder will only decode the actual audio data, and not this string at " "the end of the file."
